ygData.subject: Re: AzureBlade
ygData.msgSnippet: AzureBlade: Both of them?!?! And you tell me that Megatron was the one leading the preds you chased here?! Oh slag! This only gets worse! ... of the Predacon

AzureBlade: Both of them?!?! And you tell me that Megatron was the one
leading the preds you chased here?! Oh slag! This only gets worse!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Kup : :
> Kup: Hydras is the Predacon Commander. He is also the freakish merge
of the Predacon Megatron and former Decepticon leader Galvatron.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:AzureBlade was puzzled to hear that
name. He had never heard of such a
> bot, but Kup talked of him as an important one.
> 
> AzureBlade: Who is this Hydras anyways? I have never heard of him
> before...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > : : Kup : :
> > Kup: I would be willing to suppor an alliance with the Predacons,
> but only after we get Nightlight back. Also, no deal when it comes to
> Hydras. If there is a chance to take him out, we take it.
> > 
> > 
> > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:AzureBlade: Yes... I know of the
> evergoing vendetta... That poses a
> > problem. As I said, I am Predacon as well, but I also know better than
> > anyone that without cooperation, the Tripreds will be able to eat you
> > all alive. If we then include the Dark Prime, you're all gone. If you
> > wish, though, I can discuss a truce with the Preds so that at least
> > they don't take useless shots at you.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > > : : Kup : :
> > > Kup: Our first priority is to get Nightlight back. She is one of our
> > troops that the Preds have as a POW. She is also Rodimus' wife and he
> > isn't too happy. I imagine that when we get her back, Rodimus plans on
> > taking the Predacons out in a permanent way.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:AzureBlade: What will you do about
> > the Preds? Both groups have allied
> > > on Earth. Will you do so here?
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...>
wrote:
> > > > : : Kup : :
> > > > Kup: If it becomes clear that he cannot be brought back, no
Maximal
> > > will hesitate to terminate him.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:AzureBlade: Maybe, or maybe not.
> > > After all, he is now even worse than
> > > > what Megatron was in the first wars... Whatever you attempt, be
> > careful.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...>
> wrote:
> > > > > : : Kup : :
> > > > > Kup: I see that it may eb a small chance, but after what he has
> > > > done, i think every living transformer owes him the chance.
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:AzureBlade seemed reluctant to
> accept
> > > > Kup's words.
> > > > > 
> > > > > AzureBlade: I understand how you feel, but I personaly don't
think
> > > > > Prime can be brought back the way he was. There is a possibility
> > that
> > > > > we might soften his personality, but I'm not convinced that we
> > can get
> > > > > to the original Prime. From what intelligence has told me, the
> > > > > Tripreds seemed to have built him nearly from scratch. Still,
> there
> > > > > might be a chance, even though it must be a small one...
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...>
> > wrote:
> > > > > > : : Kup : :
> > > > > > Kup: I have to believe that there is someway to get through
> to the
> > > > > real Prime. I've known him too long, I helped train him when he
> > became
> > > > > Autobot Commander. His will is strong and good.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:AzureBlade sits down in face
> of Kup
> > > > > and nods his head.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > AzureBlade: Of course. The Maximals and Predacons were
> arguing yet
> > > > > > again when the Tripreds arrived. They had been lurking in the
> > > ranks of
> > > > > > the Preds and had waited the right moment to strike. Even with
> > both
> > > > > > the Maximal and Predacon armies, we were not able to
resist them
> > > long.
> > > > > > We were cornered in Katatronia City. We decided to retreat so
> > > that we
> > > > > > could better resist them. We embarked on a ship, Maximals and
> > > > > > Predacons, and departed for Earth. There, we established the
> > > Survivor
> > > > > > Council.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > He paused, letting the implications sink in.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > AzureBlade: However, just a few weeks ago, we learned of
Prime's
> > > > > > reconstruction and of the the Tripredacus plan. The Council
> > sent me
> > > > > > after him because of my neutrality. I am as much a
Predacon as I
> > > am a
> > > > > > Maximal. My role here is to contain or destroy Prime. He has
> > > become a
> > > > > > threat no one can afford to ignore, not even the Tripreds. We
> > > have to
> > > > > > thwart his plans.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen
<roborick007@y...>
> > > wrote:
> > > > > > > : : Kup : :
> > > > > > > Kup leads AzureBlade into his office.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Kup: Have a seat. We know that the Tripredacus have taken
> > > control of
> > > > > > Cybertron, and that they revived Optimus. Details are sketchy
> > > though.
> > > > > > You mind filling in the blanks, lad?
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:AzureBlade: I am afraid so.
> > > However,
> > > > > > since I have a lot to tell, we
> > > > > > > better go somewhere where we won't be disturbed. Things have
> > > changed
> > > > > > > dramatically since your departure from Cybertron.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > >
